notes.text:
This update for indent fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-0911: Fixed heap-based buffer overflow in set_buf_break() (bsc#1219210).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in indent, a program for formatting C code. This issue may allow an attacker to trick a user into processing a specially crafted file to trigger a heap-based buffer overflow, causing the application to crash.
notes.title: CVE description
